name: Ghostly Repo: Collateral Recovery
description:
Sneak into the house and exact your revenge on the pathetic mortal!

A spectre is on the hunt for the mortal that stole a talisman from their abode - you must sneak into a house party with your ghostly abilities and make things right.

Take on the forms of others, apparate to mortals through walls and use your powers to jinx electronics, but do so unseen - or else you may find yourself banished from the building by your prey!

This is my submission for the April 2019 #ScreamCity game jam that went on from the 12th to the 22nd.

A ghost themed stealth game that takes some inspiration from the classic 2003 game ‘Ghost Master’.

Tip: The game plays better from a birds eye view :).

Controls:

Intract (Blue Highlight) - A / Left Mouse Button

Apparate - B / Q

Dopple - X / E

Push and Pull (Green Highlight) - Right Trigger / Right Mouse Button

Drop Items - Left and Right D-Pad/Z and X

Camera - Left Joystick / Move mouse

Camera zoom - Bumpers / Scrollwheel or - and +

To see interaction range, and button prompt reminders in game, press left Trigger / Tab

For the best experience I recommend playing with an XBox controller.

Note: Options to invert camera inputs, can be found on the controls page.

The time spent was around 75 hours over 10 days. This is my first time attempting cutscenes, voice narration and building a proper narrative into the gameplay.
